DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : RETAILING
DOC.TEXT: Phil & Jim ' s Files for Bankruptcy Protection : The Phil & Jim ' s electronics and appliance chain , pressured by major manufacturers who are owed $ 8.7 million , filed to reorganize its debts under Chapter 11 of the federal bankruptcy laws . The 40-year-old Anaheim company ' s petition comes as it prepares_for a liquidation sale that begins today in five stores that remain open . The bankruptcy petition lists debts of $ 16 million , about $ 9 million of it secured , and assets of $ 7.1 million .
